contentrichtext.text: '''Wier''' is a fairly uncommon [[surname]] in the [[United States]]. It traces ancestry from the [[Wier (clan)|''Weir'' clan]] in [[Scotland]]. There are several variants of the name, but all supposedly go back to [[Aubrey de Vere II|de Vere]], a British noble family originally of Norman ancestry, from the eponymous town of [[Ver sur Mer|Ver]]. Notable persons with the surname Wier include: * [[Allen Wier]] (born 1946), American writer and professor * [[Benjamin Wier]], Canadian businessman and politician * [[Daniel Wier]] (1772–1842), Canadian farmer and political figure * [[Dara Wier]] (born 1949), American poet * [[Ester Wier]] (born 1910), American writer * [[John Wier (disambiguation)]], several persons * [[Murray Wier]] (born 1926), American basketball player * [[Roy Wier]] (1888–1963), American politician * [[Rusty Wier]] (1944–2009), American singer-songwriter * [[Todd Wier]], American basketball team owner ==See also== * [[Weyer (disambiguation)]] {{surname|Wier}}<!-- It does not help to add disambig or hndis tags where the page only contains people who share a surname -->
